page.title: 19Tavistock - Future Plans
page.content: Tavistock has lots of future plans including a{superstore}with a multi-storey car park. Another plan is to convert the bingo hall into a snooker hall/arcade with bingo.There are plans for a{Local {History Museum}by the old Tavistock Wharf. * * * * * * * * * * * The{Wharf}is going to be restored and made into a tourist attraction. This hopes to bring more money and jobs into Tavistock.This will help to build the proposed Sports Hall and Swimming Pool in the park. * * * * * * * * * * * Shops may open on Sundays if the plans for encouraging tourism succeed. Tavistock is trying to encourage light industry. Some people say we need a bypass.
